PrivacyPolicy.generalText: The protection of your personal data is important to us. Personal data is processed on this website exclusively within the framework of the legal provisions of the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Personal data is any data with which you can be personally identified (e.g., name, email address).
PrivacyPolicy.collectionHeading: 3. Collection and Storage of Personal Data
PrivacyPolicy.accountsText: When creating a user account, we process the following data: name, email address, profile picture. This data is not publicly visible and serves exclusively for the use of the platform. Legal basis: Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR (contract fulfillment)
PrivacyPolicy.contentText: Users can create content, including: chessboards, pieces, content for the marketplace. This content may be publicly visible depending on the settings. Legal basis: Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b GDPR
PrivacyPolicy.chatText: ChessPie offers a chat function. Content in the chat is stored and automatically checked for certain prohibited words (filtering). This filtering serves security and minor protection purposes. Legal basis: Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR (legitimate interest in security and moderation)
PrivacyPolicy.analyticsText: Vercel Analytics & Speed Insights: This website uses Vercel Analytics and Vercel Speed Insights to collect anonymized usage statistics and improve website performance. No cookies are set, and no personal profiles are created. Legal basis: Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. f GDPR
PrivacyPolicy.hostingText: Firebase / Firestore: We use Google Firebase (Firestore) to store user data. It cannot be excluded that data may also be processed on servers outside the EU (e.g., USA). Google is certified according to the EU-US Data Privacy Framework. Legal basis: Art. 6 Para. 1 lit. b & f GDPR
PrivacyPolicy.cookiesText: ChessPie does not use tracking cookies for advertising purposes. Technically necessary cookies may be used to provide basic functions.
PrivacyPolicy.minorsText: The offer is directed at users of all ages. Persons under 16 years of age should obtain the consent of a legal guardian if personal data is being processed.
PrivacyPolicy.rightsText: You have the right to access, rectification, erasure, restriction of processing, data portability, and objection (Art. 15-21 GDPR). Please direct your inquiries to: contact.chesspie@gmail.com
PrivacyPolicy.complaintText: You have the right to lodge a complaint with a data protection supervisory authority.

Footer.title: Frequently Asked Questions
Footer.whatIsChessPieAnswer: ChessPie is the ultimate platform for custom chess. You can design your own board, create custom pieces pixel-by-pixel, and play unique chess variants with friends online.
Footer.isItFreeAnswer: Yes, ChessPie is currently completely free to use. You can play, create, and share without any cost.
Footer.canIPlayFriendsAnswer: Absolutely! Just share your room code or link and play your custom variants instantly in your browser.
